.
s
.
<p>s</p>
.

.
some ->centered text<- in a paragraph
.
<p>some <div class="text-align-center">centered text</div> in a paragraph</p>
.

.
bold and ->**centered text**<- in a paragraph
.
<p>bold and <div class="text-align-center"><strong>centered text</strong></div> in a paragraph</p>
.

.
bold and **->centered text<-** in a paragraph
.
<p>bold and <strong><div class="text-align-center">centered text</div></strong> in a paragraph</p>
.


.
clearly not a ->centered text definition
.
<p>clearly not a -&gt;centered text definition</p>
.

.
more text that is not centered<-
.
<p>more text that is not centered&lt;-</p>
.

.
## ->Centered heading<-
.
<h2><div class="text-align-center">Centered heading</div></h2>
.

coverage
.
*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.

clean up init (constructor)
remove icon
